MerchantAccountEvent.name: MerchantAccountEvent
MerchantAccountEvent.description: Represents a merchant account platform event. Subscribe to these events so you can listen and respond to them when theyâ€™re published. For example, create a Salesforce Flow that is triggered when one of these events is published.

ChangeType.description: Type of merchant account event, which triggers an event notification. You can write code to listen to operate conditionally on the value of this field. For example, you can ignore a create change but get notified of updates.

MerchantAccountId.description: Identifies the merchant account for which the event occurs.
